CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Meanwhile , with an increase of the length of the alkyl side chains , the d 2 -spacing of PffBB-n polymers showed a descending trend of 3.84 , 3.82 , 3.77 , and 3.66 Å for PffBB-10 , PffBB-12 , PffBB-14 , and PffBB-16 , respectively , which indicated that PffBB-n with longer alkyl side chains exhibited enhanced ordered molecular packing.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PffBB-10 |
| PffBB-12 |
| PffBB-14 |
| PffBB-16 |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PffBB-10 |
| PffBB-12 |
| PffBB-14 |
| PffBB-16 |

These entities are clearly referred to as "PffBB-n" and represent different materials with varying alkyl side chain lengths.
